Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service

Interface NodeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeServiceImpl
public interface NodeService
Service implementation for managing graph nodes. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graph nodes and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getNodeByUuid

      Optional<NodeVO> getNodeByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph node by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph node
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the graph node if found

    • createAndBindGraphAndNode

      List<NodeVO> createAndBindGraphAndNode(NodeCreateDTO nodeCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates and binds a graph and a node based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      nodeCreateDTO - the DTO containing information for creating the graph and node
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
      Returns:
      the list of created nodes

    • createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode

      GraphVO createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode(GraphAndNodeCreateDTO graphNodeCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates a graph and binds it with a node based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      graphNodeCreateDTO - the DTO containing information for creating the graph and node
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
      Returns:
      the created graph node

    • deleteByUuids

      void deleteByUuids(NodeDeleteDTO nodeDeleteDTO)
      Deletes graph nodes by their UUIDs.
      Parameters:
      nodeDeleteDTO - the list of UUIDs of the graph nodes to be deleted

    • updateNode

      void updateNode(NodeUpdateDTO nodeUpdateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates a graph node based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      nodeUpdateDTO - the DTO containing information for updating the node
      tx - the Neo4j transaction

    • updateRelation

      void updateRelation(RelationUpdateDTO relationUpdateDTO)
      Updates graph node relations based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      relationUpdateDTO - the DTO containing information for updating the graph node relations

    • getkDegreeExpansion

      GraphVO getkDegreeExpansion(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, Integer k)
      Retrieves the k-degree expansion of a node in a graph.
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph
      nodeUuid - the UUID of the node
      k - the degree of expansion
      Returns:
      a GraphVO object containing the expanded nodes and their relationships.
